title: Sins of Colonialism - Collection 10 (.. in Africa 2)
description:
Sins of Colonialism - Collection 10 (.. in Africa 2):

We have 26 titles here:

-  Assensoh & Alex-Assensoh - African Military History and Politics; Coups and Ideological Incursions, 1900-Present (2001)

-  Colenso - History of the Zulu War and It s Origin (1880)

-  Coquery-Vidrovitch - Africa and the Africans in the Nineteenth Century; a Turbulent History (2009)

-  Edgerton - The Fall of the Asante Empire; the Hundred-Year War for Africa's Gold Coast (1995)

-  Guest - The Shackled Continent; Power, Corruption, and African Lives (2004)

-  Higgs - Chocolate Islands; Cocoa, Slavery, and Colonial Africa (2012)

-  Hochschild - King Leopold's Ghost; a Story of Greed, Terror, and Heroism in Colonial Africa (1998)

-  Imperato - Quest for the Jade Sea; Colonial Competition Around an East African Lake (1998)

-  Italy's War Crimes in Ethiopia; Evidence for the War Crimes Commission

-  Lock - Zulu Conquered; the March of the Red Soldiers, 1828-1884 (2010)

-  Luongo - Witchcraft and Colonial Rule in Kenya, 1900-1955 (2011)

-  Mamdani - When Victims Become Killers; Colonialism, Nativism, and the Genocide in Rwanda (2001)

-  Meredith - Diamonds, Gold, and War; the British, the Boers, and the Making of South Africa (2007)

-  Morel - The British Case in French Congo; the Story of a Great Injustice, Its Causes and Its Lessons (1903)

-  Mouser (Ed.) - A Slaving Voyage to Africa and Jamaica; the Log of the Sandown, 1793-1794 (2002)

-  Moyo - Dead Aid; Why Aid Is Not Working and How There Is a Better Way for Africa (2009)

-  Reid - Frontiers of Violence in North-East Africa; Genealogies of Conflict since 1800 (2011)

-  Searing - West African Slavery and Atlantic Commerce; the Senegal River Valley, 1700-1860 (1993)

-  Semley - Mother Is Gold, Father Is Glass; Gender and Colonialism in a Yoruba Town (2011)

-  Simon - The Ethiopian Campaign and French Political Thought (2009)

-  The Abyssinian Campaigns; the Official Story of the Conquest of Italian East Africa

-  Thomas - The Slave Trade; the Story of the Atlantic Slave Trade, 1440-1870 (1997)

-  Van Reybrouck - Congo; the Epic History of a People (2014)

-  Vanthemsche - Belgium and the Congo, 1885-1980 (2012)

-  Wauters - The Belgian Congo; Reservoir of the Allies (1942)

-  Yates - The Scramble for African Oil; Oppression, Corruption and War for Control of Africa's Natural Resources (2012)
